task.summary: Update Order to print menu items in order without menu id. Small edits to other files to tidy up project.
Change attributes to private where possible. Various small edits to structure and format in multiple classes.
Update view employees to display employee details better. Fix bug in datatase class which caused error due to a lack of a check for an int.
Update to include description field for beverages in all classes that create or read beverages.
Update edit menu to actually work. Small edits to formatting

Update readme to include instructions for running via command line. Add check for whether order cost is 0, if so don't tell user order will be ready soon. Add check to prevent customers from seeing empty menus while allowing employees to still view them

Update initMenus method based on refactored database. Update Menu constructor to read menu items from the database and create dishes or beverages from them. Update constructors for all related menu and menu item classes.

Refactor manager class to make variable names and ui more readable. Update UiUtils to be public and include check for -1 max and min values for when the range isn't needed. Refactor User class to work with new database structure
Update all relevant classes to reflect database changes - mainly there is one menu item table for dishes and beverages rather than a separate table for each.
Apply "Extract Method" refactoring technique to long methods in the User class

Update MenuFactory to account for empty menu items attribute. Update SetMeal to include method that gets the menu item ids included in the meal. Update order to have an arraylist rather than a hash map and add method AddSetMenuItem to add a menu item to an order from a set menu
Update decorator classes to fix duplicate string issue. Add check for empty menu items list in menu class. Add getAllergens method for menu items
Update to fix bug with orders for meal deals/set menus where order line items weren't written to database correctly due to hash map id being overridden
Remove duplicate email question line. Change table queried for employee salary to be the correct one. Fix inputB check by actually checking if it's true to take action

Return total cost from place order method and implement loyalty point collection after successful ordering. Add code to read loyalty points from the database. Update menu class to work with refactored database. Use null as the value of empty menu items

Implement AddNewStockItem and UpdateStockItemDetails use cases. Add methods to check for maximum stock capacity. Update beverage, dish, and menu item classes to take stock into account. Add method to check if all ingredients for a menu item are in stock so it can be hidden from the menu if not.
